_header: Behold the thorns mine head han throngen how sharp that it been
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; crucifixion
_description: ‘Lamentacio dolorosa’ (Appeal of Christ to Man from the Cross) — fourteen long lines in couplets

NLS18721.First Lines:
Behold þe þornes myn heued han þrongen hou sarpe þat
                    it benIt driuen þe blod in to myn eyne oneses ne may I
                    sen…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…be hold my bak wat sores ben sprungen þe caches knottes
                    madenþus hat det meystri of me & lif me hat for sake
